topic.title: Recommendations
topic.shortdesc: This section touches on the few recommendations for improvements we have for this group.

body.p: As discussed within the content quality section, there are only four ways in which we would improve this project.

First, a quick scan for typos by each of the members of their group would help ensure accuracy in each of their topics. Having multiple sets of eyes is an important asset when collaborating on projects, as each person will catch different errors making the final output as perfect as possible.

Second, the short descriptions, as discussed before, will take less than a minute to create, and tie your work together so that users can know exactly which page they need to access as soon as they arrive at your website. It is a very simple part of the code that makes a huge difference to your audience.
